title: Best short players ever scouted, Brian Kelly talks Notre Dame's culture & former players
itunes:title: Best short players ever scouted, Brian Kelly talks Notre Dame's culture & former players
description:
DJ and Bucky are back with a new episode. First, the pair discuss Emmanuel Sanders' trade to the 49ers and how he fits with the team (:50). Next, DJ and Bucky give names of some of the best short players they've ever scouted (2:44). Then, the guys compare two tight ends in the league for National Tight Ends Day on Sunday (9:08). After that, DJ and Bucky talk to Notre Dame head football coach Brian Kelly about the culture of the team and he tells stories about the players he's coached (13:27). Next, the duo react to Urban Meyer expressing interest in becoming the Cowboys' head coach (34:34). Later, the pair focus on college players you should watch out for and specifically, discuss players from Wisconsin and Ohio State ahead of their matchup this weekend (37:55). To wrap up the show, the pair answer fan questions, which were left in the reviews (42:51).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
